Ban petitions to ban e cigs

All of us who use e cigs know that they are a safer and healthier alternative to real smoking.

E Cigs should not be banned as they are causing no harm to anyone

They are advertised as a smoking alternative or a way to quit smoking and are not aimed at children. the flavours might seem appealing to children but those flavours are also appealing to adults.

E Cigs are not to be sold to anyone under the age of 18.

Walking around in a city centre is worse for your lungs than e cigs.

No nicotine is exhaled and even if it was nicotine is not a dangerous drug

http://ecigarettereviewed.com/top-20-rebuttals-to-win-an-e-cigarette-debate

Sign away and stop people from trying to ban e cigs
